meanings.definition: A five-membered aromatic heterocycle containing one oxygen and one nitrogen atom.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the structure of the oxazole under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: She learned about oxazole in her chemistry class.
meanings.sent3: The oxazole molecule and the nitrogen atom had a dance party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the oxazole filled the lab, reminiscent of a blooming flower.
meanings.sent5: The vivid blue color of the oxazole compound made it stand out among the others.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacy stocked various derivatives of oxazole for different medications.
meanings.sent2: He researched the uses of oxazole derivatives in the pharmaceutical industry.
meanings.sent3: The oxazole derivative and its friends formed a club for unique molecules.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was an oxazole derivative, branching out in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The derivative's properties were as diverse as the colors of a rainbow.
